intro: Ridsdalea thailandica, commonly known as the Thai ridsdalea, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees in its natural habitat. It prefers humid environments and is often found in tropical rainforests.
